titleStmt.title: The antiquities of Warwickshire illustrated from records, leiger-books, manuscripts, charters, evidences, tombes, and armes : beautified with maps, prospects and portraictures / by William Dugdale.
titleStmt.author: Dugdale, William, Sir, 1605-1686.

biblFull.extent: [14], 826 [i.e. 776], [14] p., [11] leaves of plates (some folded) : ill., geneal. tables, maps, plans, port.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
